body:
Hey kids! This is your time to shine if your a CS:GO addict like I'm turning into or just like playing CS:GO!
I got the idea after playing this round of competitive and destroyed all that came in my path ^_^
So share your times when you destroyed everyone or simply the best game you've won! Maybe you will figure out who you should ask to get tips to improve! :)

Enjoy sharing your scores everyone :D
